thread.title: Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4
thread.title_full: Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4

title: Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4
text:
> Top News Cubs win NL Division Series, beat Cardinals 6-4 in Game 4 St. Louis Cardinals' Jason Heyward (22) celebrates with Brandon Moss (21) after scoring a run on an RBI double by Tony Cruz during the sixth inning of Game 4 in baseball's National League Division Series against the Chicago Cubs, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Nam Y. Huh) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
